text: aur jab shaitaan ne unakee kaarastaaniyon ko umda kar dikhaaya aur unake kaan mein phoonk diya ki logon mein aaj koee aisa nahin jo tum par gaalib aa sake aur mai tumhaara madadagaar hoon phir jab donon lashkar mukaabil hue to apane ulate pov bhaag nikala aur kahane laga ki mai to tum se alag hoon mai vah cheejen dekh raha hoon jo tumhen nahin soojhatee main to khuda se darata hoon aur khuda bahut sakht azaab vaala hai
